title: Jackie Robinson: Part One
description: Jackie Robinson's life story through his first season in the Major Leagues. Robinson's early life in Georgia, Pasadena, UCLA, and Army are detailed; as well as his time in the Negro and minor leagues and his challenging MLB rookie season.

title: Jackie Robinson: Part Two
description: Jackie Robinson's life story from his sophomore season in the Major Leagues through his death. Robinson's Brooklyn Dodgers years, business career, as well as his role as a civil rights leader and family life are detailed.
